Package foundation.omni.money

Class TetherUSDIdentityProvider

java.lang.Object
org.javamoney.moneta.spi.base.BaseExchangeRateProvider
org.javamoney.moneta.spi.AbstractRateProvider
foundation.omni.money.TetherUSDIdentityProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExchangeRateProvider
public class TetherUSDIdentityProvider extends org.javamoney.moneta.spi.AbstractRateProvider
A ExchangeRateProvider that provides a fixed 1-to-1 mapping of USDT to USD. Note that on real-world exchanges USDT can fluctuate in price relative to USD. Based on Moneta Identity provider.
